description: Asset category (should be a controlled vocabulary)
notes: This value is a foreign key to the asset_types table.
asset_type + name can be the primary key.

description: The location enclosing the asset (like the park that contains a playground); optional
E-mail address for contacting the organization
Phone number for contacting the organization

example: Has a parking lot|Street parking|On the 61B bus route
notes: Can be a pipe-delimited list of options

description: E-mail address associated with the asset itself
Phone number associated with the asset itself
Hours of operation of the asset
Holiday hours of operation of the asset
Is the location well-suited for kids?
Number of people that can fit into the asset
notes: Sourcing these values may be hard.

It remains to be seen whether this should be a boolean or a description of the availability of ramps. See http://docs.openreferral.org/en/latest/hsda/hsda/#get--locations-location_id-accessibility-accessibility_id- for ideas.
Unclear how to fill this out. Move to events schema?

description: Is the location open to the public?
Hard to Count focus population (e.g., families, people of color, students)
notes: Can be a pipe-delimited list. Move to Census-specific table?

description: Dataset name or volunteer providing the data

notes: If data from multiple sources is used to form one record, all sources can be listed in this field in pipe-delimited form: "https://cool-assets.org|https://wprdc.org/somedataset"
